channel.title: Celine Gaudry
channel.description: Online Portfolio of Paris based Film Director, Producer and still photographer Celine Gaudry.

item.title: Pinkslip
item.description:
Camera Red edited on Avid

Writer: Celine Gaudry
Co-Writer: Kimberly McConnell
Director: Celine Gaudry
Director of Photography: Mykee del Mundo
Editor: Micah Chase

Mark is a middle age man who works as a commercial in an insurance company. His world changes as he gets fired.

item.title: Flying Trapeze
item.description:
Director: Celine Gaudry
Producer: Tim NG
Director of Photography: Ilgar Seyedi
Editor: Hamik Gasparyan
Press Relation: Kayo Yoshida

Everyone tries flying trapeze with different reasons and purposes. This documentary follows several people as they talk about the meaning of trapeze art in their lives.

item.title: Jusqu'au bout
item.description:
Producer: Céline Gaudry
Writer: Céline Gaudry
Director: Céline Gaudry
1st Assistant of the Director: Marie Prezioso
Script Supervisor: Elisa Pascarel
Director of Photography: Adrien Jeannot
Sound: Laurine Bauby
Post Production: Ludovic Foucher

A beautiful young woman struggles with her pulsions of violence during a week end in the country side of France.

item.title: Security 321
item.description:
Camera Red and Canon 5D edited on Final Cut Pro

Producer/Assistant Director: Celine Gaudry
Producer: Dmitriy Olevskiy
Director: David Romo
A camera Director of Photography / Writer: Brian Rushing
B camera Director of Photography: Carlos Urquieta
Production Designer: Jasdev Singh
Sound: Kevin Bellante

Roger, your friendly strip mall security guard, takes on ridiculous missions to keep the peace and make the strip mall a better place.

item.title: Rose Child
item.description:
Director - Tara Lucia Prades
Producers - Jon Bryant, Celine Gaudry, Jacob Potkin
Director of Photography - John Geronilla
Editors - Nick Brosco, Miguel Zarraga
Sound Designers - David Rosen, Kurt Del Rosario

A young, rose selling girl forms a beautiful friendship with a prostitute who helps her on her journey to find her mother amongst the chaos of Bangkok’s red light district where taboo, sex, alcohol and drugs are the norm.
